Title: Hair of the Dog
Plot: A series of ritualistic murders starts to look a lot like werewolves so Harry, of course, gets dragged in. Thing is, it looks like the lycanthropes aren't the killers... they're the victims.
GuestStars: Derwin Phillips,  Krista Bridges,  Ipsita Paul,  Kathleen Munroe,  Kyra Harper,  Constantine Alex Karzis
